item.Kratki: New multi hole aluminium seat bracket in compliance with FIA Appendix J art. 253.
item.Opis: New multi hole aluminium seat bracket in compliance with FIA Appendix J art. 253. New design, minimum 16 different positions. Length: 400 mm Thickness: 6 mm

item.Kratki: OMP side mount to base mount adaptor brackets, these adaptors allow you to attach a side mounted seat to car specific sub frames. 10mm thick anodised alloy construction.
Seat braket spacer with double height adjustment.

item.Ime: OMP seat mount bracket spacer mutli-adjustable
item.Kratki: Pair of seat bracket spacer, adjustment in 3 increments:+ 50 mm, + 62 mm and + 75 mm with respect to the vehicle specific adaptor.

item.Ime: Omp seat side mount brackets aluminium
item.Kratki: Pair of OMP ultra strong 6mm aluminium brackets to attach side mounted seats to subframes or seat rails.
New multi hole steel seat bracket in compliance with FIA Appendix J art. 253. New design, minimum 36 different positions.
item.Opis: New multi hole steel seat bracket in compliance with FIA Appendix J art. 253. New design, minimum 36 different positions. Length: 495 mmThickness: 3 mm

item.Kratki: Pair of aluminium brackets for seats featuring side anchorage points;allow the seat to be adjusted both vertically and longitudinally.
item.Opis: Pair of aluminium brackets for seats featuring side anchorage points;allow the seat to be adjusted both vertically and longitudinally. Professional brackets equipped with a damper, which helps reduce the compressive stress (and associated injuries) on the spinal column while driving.Patented model.

item.Kratki: OMP's Steel Side Mount Bracket is designed for a multitude of mounting positions with a high-strength construction.
item.Opis: OMP's Steel Side Mount Bracket is designed for a multitude of mounting positions with a high-strength construction. Designed to work together with OMP Racing Seats, the brackets will fit many other models with a 289mm mount-hole spacing (such as Sparco seats). The multi-hole height/angle adjustment allows for up to 21° of seat tilt. Ultra-strong steel construction features 3mm thick plate, painted in Black. Quantity: 2 in pack to attach one seatMaterial: Steel (new material strong)Weight: 3kgColour: BlackLength: 350mm

item.Kratki: Seat mounting brackets dedicated for the Mirco MX5.
OMP's Steel Side Mount Bracket is designed for a multitude of mounting positions with a high-strength construction.
item.Opis: OMP's Steel Side Mount Bracket is designed for a multitude of mounting positions with a high-strength construction. Designed to work together with OMP Racing Seats, the brackets will fit many other models with a 289mm mount-hole spacing (such as Sparco seats). The multi-hole height/angle adjustment allows for up to 21° of seat tilt. Ultra-strong steel construction features 3mm thick plate, painted in Black. Quantity: 2 in pack to attach one seatMaterial: SteelWeight: 3kgColour: BlackHeight: 180mmLength: 380mmThickness: 3mm • Lowest mounting point: 70.5mm Front, 110mm Rear• Adjustment Range: 93mm Front, 34.5mm Rear FIA Approved Ask us if you don't know how to complete your order for mountings.

item.Kratki: New multi hole ULTRA STRONG steel seat bracket in compliance with FIA Appendix J art. 253. New design, minimum 16 different positions.
item.Opis: New multi hole ULTRA STRONG steel seat bracket in compliance with FIA Appendix J art. 253. New design, minimum 16 different positions. Length: 400 mmThickness: 3 mm.

item.Kratki: FIA Approved QMS steel seat side mounts are made from 3mm powder coated steel and offer a huge range of adjustment to allow you to position your seats exactly where you want them, thanks to the multi hole design.
Sliding rail kit to be mounted between the seat mount and the seat.
item.Opis: Sliding rail kit to be mounted between the brackets and the seat. Allows the seat to be moved forwards and backwards. Very useful when different drivers are using the same seat.

item.Kratki: Universal mounting side made of high-strength steel. Allows installation of any side-mount seat.
item.Opis: Universal mounting side made of high-strength steel. Allows installation of any side-mount seat. The distance between the mounting holes is about 290 mm, maximum length - 320 mm. Fixing with a plurality of holes allowing the assembly seat set up in 25 different positions. Mount made ​​of steel plate with a thickness of 3 mm. Side mountings with FIA homologation!!
